attributes.action: Amnesty for undocumented immigrants living in uk.
attributes.background: Amnesty for undocumented immigrants living in uk for long periods of time . Never committed criminal offence. As issue was raised by labour party’s member of parliament also mr prime minister gave formal insurance that half million people will get legal right .so they can work and pay tax .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301696
